---
title: 'CAPTCHAs Solving'
description: 'Automatically solve CAPTCHAs in Notte Sessions'
---

Notte automatically solves CAPTCHAs when the `solve_captchas=True` parameter is set for session creation. This is only supported for `browser_type="firefox"`.

import SolveCaptchas from '/snippets/sessions/solve_captchas.mdx';

<SolveCaptchas />


<Warning>
  This feature is currently in beta. Send a message to [hello@notte.cc](mailto:hello@notte.cc) if you encounter any issues.
</Warning>
